name: Gekkabijin
info: A Sinner who is adept at breaking Cores. Deals Core Damage when casting an Ultimate. Does not gain Energy over time, but will instead recover 1 point of Energy per Normal Attack
maniaIntensifyText: Core Damage dealt by Ultimate is increased by 1 point.
criminalRecord:
Assassinated many Syndicate gang members and stirred up panic among the Syndicate gangs. Suspected of having a close relationship with two dangerous organizations, "The Garden" and "The Homeless". Often uses radical means but with unknown purposes.

--

The subject claims that she initially participated in illegal activity to follow in her savior's footsteps (who is now confirmed to be the leader of the Homeless, Sinner Crache). Before being arrested by the MBCC, the subject's intense survival instinct awakened her power during her battle against Sinner Sumire.

She was not fully cooperative during her early days of detention, but she's become stable gradually and has performed well in various missions.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Has special powers perfect for assassination. Using the special power will enhance the body greatly and creating amazing explosive power in a short time.

+++* Awakening Signs
In the tests of "The Garden", the subject awakened by the survival instincts and desire to succeed, which helped the subject survive from Sumire's umbrella blade.

+++* Corruption State
Weaker health than average. The mental state is greatly affected by Mania. Over-emotional and crazy when obsessed with a goal.
ecbFlavourText: "So piteously weak that I don't even want to bother killing you."
arrestRec1: After being defeated by the FAC during "the Garden" assassination mission, the subject was seriously injured and unable to escaape. The subject was sent to the MBCC for investigation due to the subject's involvement with the two Sinner organizations.
arrestRec2: A Syndicate orphan. Tortured and abused by the gang when young and was rescued by a mysterious Sinner. Believing that the Sinner belongs to "the Garden", the subject worships "the Garden" and set her goal to be an assassin in it ever since.
arrestRec3: After assassinating several Syndicate gang leaders and becoming famous, the subject finally caught the attention of "the Garden" and was allowed to take the enrollment test. Defeated by Sumire in the test, but was still allowed to join "the Garden".
arrestRec4: Found out that it wasn't "the Garden" who saved her, but "The Homeless". To show her appreciation and apology, she made and wears a Homeless badge. But she never lets this get in her way of becoming the number one assassin.
servingTerm1: She used to stick information of her targets on the wall, as well as statistics of other "Garden "members' efficiency. But ever since she was captured, she stopped progressing and has fallen far behind the assassination goals she set for herself.
servingTerm2: She was bullied by the mafia when she was young, and now she will stand up for the weak when similar situations take place. However, she does not like this form of heroism, as top killers should never be affected by emotions.
servingTerm3: Refusing to even look at the weak, while picking on the strong and refusing to listen. Gekkabijin doesn't really have friends in the Bureau, as she sees them all as rivals.
servingTerm4: Came across Gekkabijin's target list, and the Chief's name was in the center, circled many times with a red pen. However, according to surveillance data, subject only approached the Chief several times when he was asleep, but no attempts of assassination has been recorded so far.
emotionCheck1:

**Gekkabijin:** The Garden! How dare you steal my target!

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** If something similar happens again, make sure to ask the Bureau for help.

supervision1:
++* ‚ö† Practice Match

//Gekkabijin and [[[Sumire]]] are practicing swordsmanship in the Training Room.//

**System Notifications:** As usual, Gekkabijin challenges Sumire to a swordsmanship duel in the Training Room, but unsurprisingly, she loses again.

* **Prompt:** Keep at it.
supervision2:
++* ‚ö† Strange Noise

//Eerie noises often come from the detention area in the middle of the night.//

**System Notifications:** Sounds of someone sharpening a knife often come from Gekkabijin's room in the detention area late at night, which is quite irritating.

* **Prompt:** Give a stern warning!
supervision3:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† Consequences of Boasting

//A staff member from the Outdoor Activity Area requests access to the office.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: A staff member from the Outdoor Activity Area requests access to the office. Grant permission?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**System Notifications:** He walks in slowly and you're taken aback by his bruised and swollen face.

**Chief:** What happened to you?

**Staff Member:** It's all because of that Sinner, Gekkabijin!

**Staff Member:** I want to lodge a complaint! She's bullying me!

**Staff Member:** She stopped me and said she wanted to see what I was capable of, then she beat me up.

* **Prompt:** Express doubt

**Chief:** That's not right. Gekkabijin never bullies ordinary people.

**Chief:** Do you remember if you said or did anything you shouldn't have in the past few days?

**Staff Member:** Hmm... I did tell my colleagues a few days ago that I'm good at karate. Maybe she overheard that?

**Chief:** ...And how good are you?

**Staff Member:** I only started learning less than a week ago...

**Chief:** No one's really to blame for this...
supervision4:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† Study

//A rare visitor has appeared in today's library.//

**System Notifications:** The moment you see Gekkabijin, you instinctively step back out of the library.

* **Prompt:** Ask anxiously

**Chief:** What are you doing here?

**Gekkabijin:** Reading. What else would I be doing here?

**Chief:** Seriously?

**Chief:** You didn't set up any traps or anything inside, did you?

**Gekkabijin:** Hmph, clever.

**Gekkabijin:** I'm busy studying today, so I'll let you off the hook for now.

**Chief:** Studying?

**Gekkabijin:** Yes.

**System Notifications:** Gekkabijin shakes the book in her hand.

**Gekkabijin:** //101 Mysterious Cases of DisCity.// There are some points worth referencing.

**Chief:** ...Learn about something else!
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Nice to meet you. Are you the Chief of MBCC? Before I act, better keep your head on your shoulders. You are worth a lot.

[Raise to Phase 1]
You increase my power even though you know I'm dangerous? Do you think I'm no threat to you?

[Raise to Phase 3]
I am your personal blade. A sharp blade that swings towards the Garden and slices those who used to look down on me to pieces!

[Level Start]
You won't be able to run away if I find you!

[Win Battles]
What a weak opponent... You look down on me?

[Lose Battles]
Impossible... Impossible!

[Ultimate Skill]
Don't worry, this won't hurt at all!

[Die in Battles]
Weakness... is a sin...

[Greeting]
Wow, such tight security! Ha... seems like you recognize my strength.

[Conversation 1]
It's too quiet here. It reminds me of the Garden's ominous atmosphere. In any case, I still prefer it over the chaos and noise of the Syndicate.

[Conversation 2]
Many in the Garden obsess over "the art of flower arrangement," but.. I don't get it. Assassination is assassination. Why involve so many unrelated things?

[Conversation 3]
It's so thrilling to hear so-called "strongmen" howl... don't you think so?

[Special Conversation 1]
When I was saved by the garden, I wanted to be a killer just like them. Ha... haha... how dare they say that I am weak! How dare they say that I am not worthy of joining the Garden!

[Special Conversation 2]
"Gekkabijin" is the name I gave to myself. Not everyone is qualified to receive a name from the Garden. But now, if I become the strongest killer in the Garden with your power... Can't wait to see the look on that so-called Mentor's face!

[Special Conversation 3]
That "cherry blossom" move almost killed me, but with you around... I should be able to handle it easily. Hmph... it should be her turn next! 

[Full Compliance]
Thank you, Chief. After I take down all the Garden killers, I will gift you their heads! Then finally... finally I will get to enjoy you!

[Idle]
Whenever I think about the beautiful flowers withering away in this city... I become overjoyed!

[Annoyed]
Heart, artery, brain... where do you want to be cut open?

[Special Attention]
Do you pay so much attention to me because you're afraid I'll attack you?

[Dispatch]
You're sending me out? It must be a thrilling mission, right?

[Dispatch Complete]
Ah... what a bummer. I thought I could meet a worthy foe.

[Level Up]
Oh Garden... wait and see.
nightmareTalent: Versed in trap removal and performs extraordinarily in certain special encounters.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Humiliation
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: When the [Assassin's Mark] on an enemy is activated, they take additional Physical Damage equaling to 6%/8%/10% of the total damage they take while the Mark lasts.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText: "So piteously weak that I don't even want to bother killing you."

maniaIntensify.title: Core Breakthorugh
maniaIntensify.text: Core Damage from Ultimate increased by 1.

crimebrandSets.name: Energy
crimebrandSets.note: Standard energy set to increase energy generation.

crimebrandSets.name: Boss Burst
crimebrandSets.note: Increase damage dealt to enemies that are corebroken. Good for BFL and TOA.

crimebrandSets.name: Team buff
crimebrandSets.note: Buff the team's damage whenever Gekkabijin ults.

shackles.title: Lightning Shadow
shackles.description: After the battle starts, for every time Gekkabijin has activated [Assassin's Mark], she receives 10% Attack Speed bonus. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Blades of Revenge
skills.description: Gekkabijin swings her knives to attack, dealing (Attack*80%) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Headhunt
skills.description: Gekkabijin targets the enemy with the highest HP percentage on a grid, dealing (300% of Attack damage) Physical Damage and 1 Core Damage. [Headhunt] can be charged up to 2 times. Gekkabijin's Energy does not increase with time, but each of her Normal Attacks restores 1 Energy.

skills.name: Hit List
skills.description: [Headhunt] attaches a [Assassin's Mark] to the enemy hit. When Gekkabijin performs [Headhunt] on an enemy with a [Assassin's Mark] again, she deals (400% of Attack damage) additional Physical Damage.

skills.name: Target Locked
skills.description: When attacking an enemy with [Assassin's Mark], Gekkabijin gains a 10% Attack Speed bonus.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Attack +5
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Attack +6, Unlock Requirements: Dispatch Tan 10 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlocking Condition: Gekkabijin's shackle synchronization rate has increased to 5 stages
Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: Midnight Fierce Gekkabijin
supervision5:
++* ‚ö†‚ö†‚ö† Suspicious Person

//Recently, a suspicious person has shown up in the surveillance cameras at the entrance of the secret room.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: Recently, a suspicious person has shown up in the surveillance cameras at the entrance of the secret room. Please confirm.

* **Prompt:** Confirm

**System Notifications:** Restoring image ... ... ... After image comparison, this Sinner has a 99.8% similarity to Gekkabijin. Summon this Sinner?

* **Prompt:** Confirm

**Chief:** Have you been lurking around the secret room entrance these past few days?

**Gekkabijin:** What do you mean lurking? I do everything out in the open!

**Chief:** ...Fine. Have you been openly standing around the secret room entrance?

**Gekkabijin:** Of course.

**Gekkabijin:** That's the most heavily guarded place in the entire MBCC. It's the only place that piques my interest.

**Chief:** Then why don't you ever go in?

**Gekkabijin:** I... I...

**Gekkabijin:** It's to save you some dignity, Chief!

* **Prompt:** Let it go
 * **Chief:** All right, then. Thank you for your consideration.
 * **Chief:** But you shouldn't do things like that in the future, to avoid misunderstandings.

* **Prompt:** Expose her
 * **Chief:** It's because you can't get in, right?
 * **Gekkabijin:** Hmph! Don't you dare underestimate me! I'm going to show you!
